qas.question: Who has executive authority in Saint Helena?
Who exercises the authority on behalf of the queen in Saint Helena?
Who is responsible for Defence and Foreign Affairs?

context: Executive authority in Saint Helena is vested in <a0_0>Queen Elizabeth II<a0_0/> and is exercised on her behalf by <a1_0>the Governor<a1_0/> of Saint Helena. The Governor is appointed by the Queen on the advice of the British government. Defence and Foreign Affairs remain the responsibility of <a2_0>the United Kingdom<a2_0/>.
